docs.lead_paragraph: The young artists who must live, work, and sleep in the studio are often puzzled how to manage the big, square space so that it shall afford the comforts of a home, and yet not give undue prominence to the domestic and sleeping arrangements. Wonderful transformations take place sometimes under the feminine touch within the barren space.

headline.main: HOUSEKEEPING IN STUDIOS.; A Suggestion for a Pretty and Useful Annex.

docs.snippet: The young artists who must live, work, and sleep in the studio are often puzzled how to manage the big, square space so that it shall afford the comforts of a home, and yet not give undue prominence to the domestic and sleeping arrangements....
